creator: peter.mahlmann@deutschebahn.com
text:
Created attachment 33426
Case study by Deutsche Bahn detailing the use of POI in an industrial research context

Dear all,

attached is a case study by Deutsche Bahn detailing the use of POI in an industrial research context.

Thanks a lot for the great content, very interesting read. This is now published via r1724262 and is already available on the live site at http://poi.apache.org/. I also added a news-entry to make people aware of the new content.

Please be sure to provide patches for things that make sense to be incorporated into mainline POI.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
tallison@mitre.org
text:
W00t!  Thank you for sharing!

Many thanks to Moritz Dorka and Filip Bednarik for their contributions to list support in POI and Tika (POI-56998 and POI-57889 and TIKA-1315)!

Dominik, thank you for your review of POI-56998!
